name: Vegan Pumpkin Cake Bars
description: Vegan Pumpkin Cake Bars are made of fluffy, moist pumpkin sheet cake and topped with a “cream cheese” icing. A Fall tradition!

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F and grease a jelly roll pan (15 x 10 inches). Set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F and grease a jelly roll pan (15 x 10 inches). Set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix the ground flaxseed and water in a small bowl and set aside to make your flax eggs.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix the ground flaxseed and water in a small bowl and set aside to make your flax eggs.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, whisk together the pumpkin puree, coconut oil, sugar and flax eggs until smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, whisk together the pumpkin puree, coconut oil, sugar and flax eggs until smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Now add the flour to the wet ingredients. Sprinkle the baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, nutmeg and salt on top of the flour and mix with a large spoon until just combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Now add the flour to the wet ingredients. Sprinkle the baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, nutmeg and salt on top of the flour and mix with a large spoon until just combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour into the prepared pan and smooth out evenly. Bake for 25-30 minutes, until a toothpick inserted into the middle comes out clean. Let the cake cool completely before frosting.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour into the prepared pan and smooth out evenly. Bake for 25-30 minutes, until a toothpick inserted into the middle comes out clean. Let the cake cool completely before frosting.

recipeInstructions.text: Make the Frosting: Using a hand mixer, beat the softened vegan butter for about 2 minutes until creamy, then add the powdered sugar, apple cider vinegar and vanilla and beat everything together until smooth and creamy, adding a tablespoon of non-dairy milk at a time as needed. If you add too much milk and it gets runny, you will need to add more powdered sugar.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the Frosting: Using a hand mixer, beat the softened vegan butter for about 2 minutes until creamy, then add the powdered sugar, apple cider vinegar and vanilla and beat everything together until smooth and creamy, adding a tablespoon of non-dairy milk at a time as needed. If you add too much milk and it gets runny, you will need to add more powdered sugar.

recipeInstructions.text: Once the cake is cooled completely, frost the cake, cut into bars and serve. Enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Once the cake is cooled completely, frost the cake, cut into bars and serve. Enjoy!

keywords: pumpkin bars, vegan pumpkin bars, vegan pumpkin cake
